name: From the Stars Came Redemption
description:
Basil is a lonely soul living on a moon not meant for people like him. When he's given the chance to escape, all hell breaks loose. His new friends want to help him, but can they break down his walls in time?

From the Stars Came Redemption contains content meant for mature audiences

All of my projects will always and forever be free. If you'd like to support my work, head over to my patreon.
